channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘I’m simply exhausted’: I’m 55 and have $1.3 million for retirement. Can I retire next year?
item.description: “I had a major health scare 4 years ago, and I’ve seen close friends die from cancer, heart disease, etc., way too soon.”

item.title: How Greenland could turn into a Big Tech problem, according to Morgan Stanley’s Mike Wilson
item.description: Strategists like Morgan Stanley’s chief U.S. equity strategist say fallout from a brewing U.S.-Europe spat over Greenland could be bad for tech.

item.title: My sister is buying our parents’ $3 million house, but wants to deduct $100K for renovations. Who’s right?
item.description: “If she didn’t want the home, it would have been sold at fair market value.”

item.title: Ask these 3 questions before deciding whether to do your own taxes or hire a pro
item.description: Tax filing season starts Jan. 26 and it’s the first with Trump big new tax law on the books

item.title: 3M’s earnings beat can’t save the stock from the broad-market selloff
item.description: Overall revenue tops forecasts, but the consumer business extends streak of misses

item.title: Solstice was spun off from Honeywell in October. RBC is bullish on the stock's future
item.description: The bank upgraded the chemicals stock to outperform.

item.title: These stocks are leading 'meaningful breakthroughs' in quantum computing, UBS says
item.description: Quantum computing is an industry with "extraordinary potential," according to UBS, which highlighted leading stocks.

item.title: Here's what Trump's push into mortgage bonds could mean for income investors
item.description: The president recently directed Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac purchase $200 billion in agency mortgage-backed securities. Investors bought on the news.

item.title: Top Wall Street analysts are confident about these three stocks for the long term
item.description: TipRanks highlights three stocks, including Broadcom and Meta Platforms, favored by Wall Street pros.

item.title: Buffett’s pledge to give away 99% of his wealth could eventually test Berkshire’s shield against activists
item.description: Investors and analysts say the estate plan raises questions about how Berkshire will be governed once Buffett and his heirs' influence is diluted.
